english_example_sentence: The small student would always speak exciting stories in his old school.
russian_example_sentence: Маленький ученик всегда рассказывал увлекательные истории в своей старой школе.
turkish_example_sentence: Küçük öğrenci, eski okulunda her zaman heyecanlı hikayeler konuşurdu.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Küçük öğrenci, eski okulunda her zaman heyecanlı hikayeler ______.
